title: Dark.Souls.II.Crown.of.the.Ivory.King-CODEX
description:
CODEX INFO:

"DARK SOULS II Crown of the Ivory King" is the third of 3 large-scale
DLC additions to DARK SOULS II, and includes all-new stages, maps,
boss characters, weapons & armor! In this third DLC, players will find
themselves in a world shining bright with the glow of treacherous ice.
Can you find and recover the lost crown?

Notes: As the game files completely updated, we've decided to make this
       release a standalone, which includes newest DLC, pre-order DLCs,
       Crown of the Sunken King DLC, Crown of the Old Irong King DLC 
       and the main game updated to 1.06 version.
       This is the last DLC for Dark Souls II.

Savegames from RELOADED main release are compatible.           
     
Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go 
online.

----------------------------------------

Murphy notes:

For this exe file, it doesn't patch a previously installed game.
Rather it has a delta patch to change the old iron king iso to the ivory
king iso. Since I've already upped the old iron king iso and the patch is
less than 700mb, this seems to be a good way to go.

I probably could have made delta patches and a script for the actual steam
files, but that would really be a lot of work, and it's still better to have
the iso.

My old iron king torrent (iso source) is at: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10882321" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10882321</a>

**INSTRUCTIONS**:
1 - copy/move the old.iron.king-to-ivory.king-patch-for-CODEX-isos.exe file to
The folder containing: codex-dark.souls.ii.crown.of.the.old.iron.king.iso

2 - run the exe file. When the delta starts making the 2nd iso it will say that
it is extracting using smartversion 3 32-bit version.

3 - verify your hash if you wish. The ivory king iso details are as follows:

File: codex-dark.souls.ii.crown.of.the.ivory.king.iso
Size: 14.0 GB
SHA1: 193E4798A6AD077107498FF410B3EE6DFE949B7E

-- Patch details: --

File: old.iron.king-to-ivory.king-patch-for-CODEX-isos.exe
Size: 646 MB
SHA1: E596A98389E32CE454E6585271E487113A65DE6B

Created using my SVF to SFX creator and smartversion 3.
You can make your own patches for similar isos if you wish.
We've put all the information and tools in the applications xdelta thread.
I'll put a link to MDL in the torrent for those that are curious.

Enjoy, and ffs buy the game if you want to see more games like it.
I did, and you should too if you can. The last thing we need is more boring-ass CoD clones.

-murph
